body_html:
Added Make directory of log_dir to avoid non-existed directory that may cause failure on other platforms.

if tf.gfile.Exists(FLAGS.log_dir): tf.gfile.DeleteRecursively(FLAGS.log_dir) tf.gfile.MakeDirs(FLAGS.log_dir)
body_text:
Added Make directory of log_dir to avoid non-existed directory that may cause failure on other platforms.
if tf.gfile.Exists(FLAGS.log_dir): tf.gfile.DeleteRecursively(FLAGS.log_dir) tf.gfile.MakeDirs(FLAGS.log_dir)
body:
Added Make directory of log_dir to avoid non-existed directory that may cause failure on other platforms.

`if tf.gfile.Exists(FLAGS.log_dir):
    tf.gfile.DeleteRecursively(FLAGS.log_dir)
  tf.gfile.MakeDirs(FLAGS.log_dir)`
